abstract: Defying neutrals and violating promises to the United States, Berlin proclaimed the intention to torpedo all ships found near the British, French and Italian coasts.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Germany has played her last card and placed herself outside of all laws and far beyond the place of civilization by proclaiming her intention to pursue her submarine warfare to its extreme limits, against neutral as well as belligerent shipping, in her determination to starve the Allies and end the war.
snippet: Defying neutrals and violating promises to the United States, Berlin proclaimed the intention to torpedo all ships found near the British, French and Italian coasts....

headline.main: 1917: Germany Unleashes War on Whole World With Effort to Starve Allies by Piracy Blockade
